sentences.sContent: Your room’s huge compared to mine.
sentences.sCn: 你的房间跟我的比很大。

sentences.sContent: These shoes make my feet look huge.
sentences.sCn: 这双鞋让我的脚看上去大极了。

sentences.sContent: the huge scale of the problem
...When he looked closer he realized it was a huge group of bees...
...And we expect this will have a huge impact on obesity...
...If he succeeds in curbing costs - a big if - it would be a huge gain for America...
...Hotel owners found themselves with a huge number of empty rooms even as a lot of unnecessary new hotels were ready to open...
...It is the most prominent example of a huge new "sharing economy"...
...Airbnb's success clearly illustrates the emergence of a huge sharing economy...
...and it's going -to put a huge drag on...
...Subsidized loans to college students are a huge waste of money...
...We tend to think of the Depression as a time when families pulled together to survive huge job losses...
...online customers have access to commodities of such a huge variety and number...

trans.tranOther: extremely large in size, amount, or degree
